verses.verse: "If you will return, <WH7725> Israel, <WH3478>" says <WH5002> Yahweh, <WH3068> "if you will return <WH7725> to me, <WH5493> and if you will put away your abominations <WH8251> out of my sight; <WH6440> then you shall not be removed; <WH5110>

a full <WH4392> wind <WH7307> from these shall come <WH935> for me. <WH1696> Now I will also utter judgments against them. <WH4941>"

"For my people <WH5971> are foolish, <WH191> they don't <WH3045> know me. <WH5530> They are foolish children, <WH1121> and they have no understanding. <WH995> They are skillful <WH2450> in doing evil, <WH7489> but to do good <WH3190> they have no knowledge. <WH3045>"
